A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a bad movie. Following on from the force awakens it just kills any plot threads and feels like it is the end. The story goes on pointless tangents to push a save the animals agenda. The characters are subverted just to shock rather than meaningfully. The humour frequently falls flat and is often out of place. Overall it was sad to see what they did to one of my favourite franchises.
